name: Verkada
info: Won internal award for 'most likely to improve users's security' by improving runtime Kubernetes security. Developed agentic workflows to make the security team more efficient.

name: Raycast Extensions
info: Multiple open source Raycast extensions with over 15k downloads. Google Maps Search allows you to quickly open Google Maps directions, for example from your current location to your home.

name: Parallel Computing
info: Tested a new language for implicit dataflow parallelism. Achieved a 20x reduction of run time by running parallel computations on GPUs using CUDA.
